meanings.sent1: Her misestimations about the weather often led to forgotten umbrellas.
meanings.sent2: The team's misestimations about the opponent's strength cost them the game.
meanings.sent3: His misestimations of his own cooking skills made for some interesting dinner parties.
meanings.sent4: The misestimations in her travel plans left her stranded in an unfamiliar city.
meanings.sent5: The misestimations in the detective's theory led to the wrong suspect being arrested.

meanings.definition: To make a mistake in estimating.
meanings.sent1: They misestimations the time it would take to finish the project.
meanings.sent2: She often misestimations the distance to the nearest grocery store.
meanings.sent3: The chef misestimations the amount of salt needed in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: He misestimations the cost of the repairs and ended up over budget.
meanings.sent5: The architect misestimations the load-bearing capacity of the structure, causing it to collapse.
